metadata.Title: CVE-2019-2391 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Incorrect parsing of certain JSON input may result in js-bson not correctlyserializing BSON. This may cause unexpected application behaviour includingdata disclosure. This issue affects: MongoDB Inc. js-bson library version1.1.3 and prior to.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-2391` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

node-mongodb - 3.5.6+~cs11.12.19-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-mongodb package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.5.6+~cs11.12.19-1').
